camos.name: Brushstroke
camos.mission: Get _goal Kills with the _name when it's Pack-A-Punched in Zombies

camos.name: Vintage
camos.mission: Get _goal Special or Elite Eliminations with the _name in Zombies (Bosses count as 3 Eliminations)

camos.name: Fauna
camos.mission: Get 10 kills rapidly _goal with the _name in Zombies

camos.name: Topography
camos.mission: Get 3 or more Critical Hit Kills rapidly with the _name _goal times in Zombies

camos.name: Infection
camos.mission: Get 20 or more consecutive Kills with the _name without getting hit _goal times in Zombies

camos.name: Mastery
mission: Unlock 35 Zombies Camos for the _name
Unlock Gold Camo for 1 Melee Weapon and 1 Special Weapon in Zombies
Unlock Diamond Camo for all Weapons Classes in Zombies
